Question
========
  
The class Generalized linear models includes General linear models.

Which link function belongs to the Generalized linear model? 
Answerlist
----------
* Normal link
* Identity link
* Log link
* Logit link

Solution
========

In the general linear model, the mean of *y* is modeled directly: $g(\mu) = \mu$. This link function is called the Identity link (the link function consists of multiplying the average by 1).

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
